channel.title: [PI] Virtual Energy
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b][/b][/size]
Hi MoparScape! It's me Nonamee here. I used to play RSPS's and make my own servers a month or two ago. I then got into a different game, and now I'm back here, making another server. :) I made a server, so I could have fun on it, along with many other people. I hope you will enjoy it.
[size=36pt][b][/b][/size]
For coders, I am willing to use Dropbox and TeamViewer. The server provides no lag, even without a VPS. 24/7, I can't promise, but I am looking forward to either getting a VPS or using my other computer to host the server.
Here are some features
[ul] [li][color=goldenrod][b]Gambling system[/b][/li][/ul]
A great way to make money on the server. You do ::gamble25m, ::gamble50m, or ::gamble100m.
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/gambling.png[/img]
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Summoning[/b][/li][/ul]
Once you have the charms, simply go to our summoning shop, buy the supplies, use the item on the pouch, and bam! Summoning!
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/summoning.png[/img]
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Hunter[/b][/li][/ul]
Catch implings and sell them to the general store for money!
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/hunterjkj.png[/img]
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Custom home[/b][/li][/ul]
We have a custom home!
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/customhouvu.png[/img]
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Lottery[/b][/li][/ul]
Talk to Lottie at home and enter the lottery for a fee of 50M! Once the lottery fund reaches 2b, a winner is randomly selected. You can enter up to 5 times per draw.
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/lotteryrsr.png[/img]
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Working vesta, divine, and chaotic![/b][/li][/ul]
We have chaotic rapiers, longswords, and mauls! We also have divine, arcane, elysian, and spectral spirit shields too! Another thing we have, is vesta, statius, and zuriel's armor!
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/shop.png[/img]
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Extreme Potions and Overloads[/b][/li][/ul]
This server has extreme potions (strength, attack, defence, range, mage) and overloads!
[ul][li][color=goldenrod][b]Quests[/b][/li][/ul]
4 quests with rewards
[size=36pt]This server is amazing![/size]
Apply now or miss out on all the fun!
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Suggester/GFX designer only available now): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Are you familiar with coding PI (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of Virtual Energy?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [/code] [size=2][b][anchor=staff]Staff List[/b][/size]
Owner:
[b]2/2[/b]
Noname/Nonamee Blitzen
Hoster:
[b]1/1[/b]
Blitzen
Admin (Apps closed, must earn):
[b]1/4[/b]
Nolan/nolan2131
Lead Developer:
[b]0/1[/b]
None
Coders:
[b]3/5[/b]
Noname/Nonamee Blitzen Arham 4
Suggestors:
[b]0/5[/b]
None None None None None
Mod (Apps closed, must earn.):
[b]0/4[/b]
None None None None
GFX Designers:
[b]0/2[/b]
None None
My MSN: hail_headshot@live.com
[b]Artesia:[/b] For his source. [b]arham 4:[/b] For the layout [b]Anyone else who feels that they deserve credit.[/b]
---

item.title: [PI] Virtual Energy
item.dc:creator: @NikeInc NikeInc_
item.description:
@NikeInc wrote:

[quote=“subzero_x, post:2, topic:427323”] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: dzoa
How old are you?: 9
E-mail address?: um idk
What position do you want? (Admin, Coder, Suggester, Mod, GFX designer): admin
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: i pick admin
Are you familiar with coding PI (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: i sed i pick admin
What time zone are you in?: um its 10 were i m
How long will you be on everyday?: 2 hour
Why do you want to become part of Virtual Energy?: i want admin
Any Suggestions?: idk
//Other Info Below Here\
idk wat 2 put here[/quote]

Trolol.

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Pim
How old are you?: 17
E-mail address?: Ill pm it if you ask for it.
What position do you want? (Suggester/GFX designer only available now): Mod/Admin/Suggester/Respected Member, anything suits me. I just wanna chill in the server, PK a little, and probably dice.
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: 2 years+
Are you familiar with coding PI (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Enough to help when needed, but I dont want to have a coder rank nor do I choose to be a coder.
What time zone are you in?: Central
How long will you be on everyday?: Every Hour after School.
Why do you want to become part of Virtual Energy?: I’m bored with school starting up and I need something to do haha.
Any Suggestions?: None atm.
//Other Info Below Here\
Nothing, thats it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Virtual Energy
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

[quote=“Java_, post:39, topic:427323”]

Leeched FormationX pointshop much?[/quote]

Now you…? This is true; I was thinking about removing that shop and seperating it into a few different shops and adding some other stuff. Just to keep it organized.

Dunder Mifflin:

I can jar your client If you need me too. :rolleyes:

Could you? Haha. I tried, but it just can’t find the main class. I tried it some time in September of 2011, and it worked fine. I even made a webclient at that time. I tried jarring this, and as I said, it can’t find the main class.
